headline: Delaware Life Teams Up With BlackRock To Bring Bitcoin Exposure To Annuities
summary: Delaware Life is taking a new step toward mainstreaming Bitcoin exposure in retirement-style products, adding a BlackRock-built index that blends US equities and Bitcoin to its fixed indexed annuity lineup.The insurer, which sits within Group 1001, said Tuesday it has added the BlackRock US Equity Bitcoin Balanced Risk 12% Index ...

headline: Nvidia CEO Says Trillions More Needed for AI Buildout
summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said the infrastructure around artificial intelligence will need trillions of dollars in additional investment over the coming years. He made the comments during a conversation with BlackRock's Larry Fink at the World Economic Forum's annual meeting in Davos, Switzerland.

headline: Trump delays Fed chair decision while at Davos
summary: Investing.com -- President Trump has not yet decided on his nominee for Federal Reserve chair and will not make an announcement during his visit to Davos, a White House official told reporters on Wednesday.

headline: Wealth Tech Market Research Report 2026-2031
summary: The WealthTech market, valued at USD 9 billion in 2025, is expected to surge to USD 21 billion by 2031 with a CAGR of 15.17%. Key to this growth are advancements in AI, machine learning, and blockchain, enhancing robo-advisors, portfolio management software, and digital financial planning. These technologies provide rapid, personalized investment strategies and improve financial inclusion. The market is driven by increased digital adoption and smartphone penetration, expanding reach and engageme

headline: Trump at Davos: I'll announce new Fed chair very soon
summary: President Trump stated that he is close to announcing his nominee to be the next chair of the Federal Reserve in his address at the World Economic Forum (WEF) in Davos, Switzerland, on Wednesday. Current Fed Chair Jerome Powell's term is set to end in May. Be sure to check out Jennifer Schonberger's profiles on each of the possible candidates to be the next Fed chair: National Economic Council director Kevin Hassett, former Fed Governor Kevin Warsh, Fed Governor Chris Waller, Fed Vice Chair of Supervision Michelle Bowman, and BlackRock's (BLK) head of fixed income Rick Rieder. Yahoo Finance interviewed Kevin Hassett in late November 2025. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: Trump at Davos: I'll announce new Fed chair very soon
content.description:
President Trump stated that he is close to announcing his nominee to be the next chair of the Federal Reserve in his address at the World Economic Forum (WEF) in Davos, Switzerland, on Wednesday. Current Fed Chair Jerome Powell's term is set to end in May.

Be sure to check out Jennifer Schonberger's profiles on each of the possible candidates to be the next Fed chair: National Economic Council director Kevin Hassett, former Fed Governor Kevin Warsh, Fed Governor Chris Waller, Fed Vice Chair of Supervision Michelle Bowman, and BlackRock's (BLK) head of fixed income Rick Rieder. Yahoo Finance interviewed Kevin Hassett in late November 2025.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
content.summary: President Trump stated that he is close to announcing his nominee to be the next chair of the Federal Reserve in his address at the World Economic Forum (WEF) in Davos, Switzerland, on Wednesday. Current Fed Chair Jerome Powell's term is set to end in May. Be sure to check out Jennifer Schonberger's profiles on each of the possible candidates to be the next Fed chair: National Economic Council director Kevin Hassett, former Fed Governor Kevin Warsh, Fed Governor Chris Waller, Fed Vice Chair of Supervision Michelle Bowman, and BlackRock's (BLK) head of fixed income Rick Rieder. Yahoo Finance interviewed Kevin Hassett in late November 2025. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: Supreme Court Hears Trump V. Fed Gov. Lisa Cook (Live Coverage)
summary: The Supreme Court will hear arguments starting at 10 a.m. ET over President Trump's attempt to fire Federal Reserve Gov. Lisa Cook for cause.  The case will determine whether Trump gets another Fed appointment to help him shift monetary policy in a dovish direction.  Trump also is set to announce his choice for the next Fed chairman in coming days.

content.title: Supreme Court Hears Trump V. Fed Gov. Lisa Cook (Live Coverage)
content.summary: The Supreme Court will hear arguments starting at 10 a.m. ET over President Trump's attempt to fire Federal Reserve Gov. Lisa Cook for cause.  The case will determine whether Trump gets another Fed appointment to help him shift monetary policy in a dovish direction.  Trump also is set to announce his choice for the next Fed chairman in coming days.

headline: Trump: Will Name Next Federal Reserve Chair in 'Not-Too-Distant Future’
summary: President Trump said he will announce a nominee to chair the Federal Reserve “in the not-too-distant future” and said of his coming choice: “He’ll do a very good job—see, I gave away some of it—‘he.’” Trump has repeatedly slammed Fed Chair Jerome Powell, whose term ends in May.

content.title: Trump: Will Name Next Federal Reserve Chair in 'Not-Too-Distant Future’

headline: Supreme Court Wary Of Hurting Fed Independence (Live Coverage)
summary: Supreme Court justices appear disinclined to side with President Trump in his attempt to fire Federal Reserve Gov. Lisa Cook for cause before a lower court hears the case.  Cook's firing was blocked temporarily while the case plays out.  The case will determine whether Trump gets another Fed appointment to help him shift monetary policy in a dovish direction.

content.title: Supreme Court Wary Of Hurting Fed Independence (Live Coverage)
content.summary: Supreme Court justices appear disinclined to side with President Trump in his attempt to fire Federal Reserve Gov. Lisa Cook for cause before a lower court hears the case.  Cook's firing was blocked temporarily while the case plays out.  The case will determine whether Trump gets another Fed appointment to help him shift monetary policy in a dovish direction.

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider BlackRock (BLK) After Its Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether BlackRock's share price still reflects good value or if most of the opportunity is already priced in, you are not alone. BlackRock closed at US$1,110.05, with returns of 1.9% over 7 days, 4.7% over 30 days, 2.3% year to date, 11.9% over 1 year, 58.7% over 3 years and 73.4% over 5 years. This naturally raises questions about what is currently built into expectations. Recent headlines around BlackRock have focused on its scale as a global asset manager and its role...

headline: Jensen Huang says AI bubble fears are dwarfed by ‘the largest infrastructure buildout in human history’
